results.title: Abridge, Innovaccer, Ambience Healthcare respond to Epic's AI push
results.content: AI # How five AI startups are strategizing around Epic’s big push Artificial intelligence-focused companies that have made inroads among health systems suddenly find themselves with a new competitor: Epic. Banner Health’s Colorado restructuring to displace 351 workers Banner Health will convert a Colorado hospital and close a freestanding emergency department in November, among other changes. Insurance Banner Health’s Colorado restructuring to displace 351 workers How CVS is working with health systems to push primary care ## See More in AI The prior authorization companies ready to take on insurers WellSpan serving as testing ground for General Catalyst companies AI Tracker: Stanford Medicine launches AI center for PTSD Banner and Anthropic showcase the healthcare AI space race

results.title: Abridge scores $300M series E, boosting valuation to $5.3B
results.content: Expanding its gen AI tools to the inpatient setting opens up an entirely new surface area for innovation, Shiv Rao, M.D., Abridge CEO and a practicing cardiologist, told Fierce Healthcare last week The company's new capabilities and features represent how Abridge "is going millions of miles deep" on developing gen AI tools for different care settings and different clinical workflows, Rao told Fierce Healthcare. Abridge Andreessen Horowitz Khosla Ventures funding round venture capital (VC) electronic health records (EHRs) ambient AI generative AI Artificial Intelligence Revenue Cycle Management Finance Health Tech Hospitals Practices Providers AI and Machine Learning

results.title: Top Abridge Alternatives, Competitors - CB Insights
results.content: Pieces Technologies specializes in clinical generative artificial-intelligence (AI) solutions within the healthcare sector. Ambience operates as a healthcare technology company that provides ambient artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for clinical documentation, coding, and patient summar… Beam Health focuses on healthcare technology, providing AI-based solutions for medical documentation. The company offers an AI assistant that generates clinical notes in real-time, integrated into electronic health records (EHRs), to address clinician workload and patient care. The company offers Suki Assistant, which supports healthcare documentation and administrative tasks, and Suki Platform, enabling healthcare technology companies to integrate artificial intelligence (AI) features. Ambience operates as a healthcare technology company that provides ambient artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for clinical documentation, coding, and patient summaries.

results.title: 'First-of-its kind' relationship: Highmark Health, Abridge announce ...
results.content: ***AHN will use Abridge's AI-powered ambient clinical intelligence platform to enhance system-wide patient-clinician interactions; Highmark Health is working with Abridge to facilitate real-time prior authorization at the point of conversation using AI*** PITTSBURGH, Aug. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Highmark Health announced today the launch of an enterprise-wide collaboration with Abridge to deploy its ambient clinical documentation platform, collaborate on a paradigm-shifting prior authorization solution at the point of conversation, and invest in other innovative tools that integrate Abridge's AI technology. "Highmark Health has long been focused on simplifying the prior authorization process, and recently we joined many other U.S. health plans in redoubling our commitment to connecting patients more quickly to the care they need while also reducing administrative burdens on the clinicians who provide that care," said **Tony Farah, MD, EVP, Chief Medical and Clinical Transformation Officer for Highmark Health**.

results.title: Abridge: Generative AI for Clinical Conversations
results.content: Deploys Abridge AI Platform for Clinical Documentation Across EnterpriseKaiser Permanente Mayo Clinic Expands Use of Abridge AI Platform Enterprise-wide to 2,000+ Physicians, Building on Existing Efforts with Nursing Documentation Johns Hopkins Medicine Deploys Abridge AI Platform for Clinical Documentation Across EnterpriseKaiser Permanente Mayo Clinic Expands Use of Abridge AI Platform Enterprise-wide to 2,000+ Physicians, Building on Existing Efforts with Nursing Documentation Abridge transforms patient-clinician conversations into contextually aware, clinically useful, and billable AI-generated notes. Leading healthcare AI infrastructure powering the most trusted clinically useful, billable, and compliant notes at the point of care. Leading healthcare AI infrastructure powering the most clinically useful and billable notes at the point of care. ## Abridge Named Market Leader in Ambient AI KLAS Report

Ambience operates as a healthcare technology company that provides ambient artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for clinical documentation, coding, and patient summar… Beam Health focuses on healthcare technology, providing AI-based solutions for medical documentation. The company offers an AI assistant that generates clinical notes in real-time, integrated into electronic health records (EHRs), to address clinician workload and patient care. The company offers Suki Assistant, which supports healthcare documentation and administrative tasks, and Suki Platform, enabling healthcare technology companies to integrate artificial intelligence (AI) features. Ambience operates as a healthcare technology company that provides ambient artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for clinical documentation, coding, and patient summaries.

'First-of-its kind' relationship: Highmark Health, Abridge announce ...
***AHN will use Abridge's AI-powered ambient clinical intelligence platform to enhance system-wide patient-clinician interactions; Highmark Health is working with Abridge to facilitate real-time prior authorization at the point of conversation using AI*** PITTSBURGH, Aug. 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Highmark Health announced today the launch of an enterprise-wide collaboration with Abridge to deploy its ambient clinical documentation platform, collaborate on a paradigm-shifting prior authorization solution at the point of conversation, and invest in other innovative tools that integrate Abridge's AI technology. "Highmark Health has long been focused on simplifying the prior authorization process, and recently we joined many other U.S. health plans in redoubling our commitment to connecting patients more quickly to the care they need while also reducing administrative burdens on the clinicians who provide that care," said **Tony Farah, MD, EVP, Chief Medical and Clinical Transformation Officer for Highmark Health**.
